topics.body:
Just watched the first episode of Ohranger.

I'm kind of in love with this show.

It opened up with Baranoia razing Tokyo to the ground. And it proceeded with showing the four soon to be Ohrangers being taken down and constantly pursued by Baranoia's army on foot. (Putting emphasis on how completely ruthless and Nigh-Unstoppable they are.)

Then Oh-red showed up and took care of pretty much the entire group that was pursuing the other four.

It's a real shame what happens to Ohranger soon, As it would definetly be my favorite sentai ever if it stayed like this.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55abc8746368723fa1000561#post_55abc8746368723fa1000561
You're probably thinking of Turbo. (Which was adapted from the widely praised Carranger)

While Ohranger started out really good, It started to become a bit more divisive around episode 9. (Due to events occurring in Tokyo at the time, They had to tone it down immensely)
